snippet: Howard W. Koch Jr., known widely as "Hawk," succeeds Tom Sherak, who stepped down on reaching a term limit as president of the Academy, which presents the Oscars.
abstract: Howard W. Koch Jr., known widely as "Hawk," succeeds Tom Sherak, who stepped down on reaching a term limit as president of the Academy, which presents the Oscars.

headline.main: Howard Koch, Longtime Producer, Named Academy President

keywords.name: organizations
